file_content.text: Aaarrrghhh! It's... it's gone! You broke... uhh!
That's music to my ears. Hello, Valon. I've been waiting for this since we buried Antilles.
Just hold on. Jedi, I got a deal for you, hear me out.
You're hardly in a position to try anything. Speak.
There's no harm in listening.
My patience is wearing thin.
Make it quick.
Your Rift Alliance needs help, right? I got men, ships, equipment... I could attack the Empire's trade routes for you.
You had better be joking.
The armor's broken, but you'd get the pick of what I got left. You can have my oath right now.
You must answer for the men you killed.
No. There will be justice.
Your ambition makes you too dangerous to be trusted.
You'd just betray me.
Very well. Just remember who's in charge, and this could work out nicely.
I accept.
You're letting him go? For a few ships and blasters? The dead deserve justice!
I understand. Your men have earned this.
Then take him.
I don't like it either, but the Rift Alliance worlds--your soldiers' homeworlds--deserve protection.
This is a necessary evil.
I--okay. But for the record, I hate this.
Accept your superior's decisions, or find a new job.
Enough, soldier!
But you--he--yes. Sir.
I swear, by the first man I killed, to serve you. My life's yours.
I need to go heal up, but after that--what are your orders?
Start shipping supplies to the Rift Alliance. Food, medicine, whatever they need.
Support the Rift Alliance.
For now, rally as many pirates as you can to our cause.
Gather more followers.
Begin raiding Imperial shipping lanes and small vessels. Do plenty of damage.
Harass the Empire.
You're the boss.
Fine. Mission done, I guess. My men and I will meet you back at base.
No.
And that means you finally get to enjoy some Republic hospitality, Valon.
Thank you, Jedi. For everything. Meet us back at the Republic base--we'll get our "guest" where he belongs.
They're stubborn, Valon. But when the flagship is ready, the rest of the White Maw will follow. We--who's that?
Someone who can't take a hint. I was hoping you'd be here for this.
See? Some in the White Maw see that I'm the future. When this ship is raised, I'll have a whole planet of followers.
You're no pirate lord. You're just a thief with a set of healing armor.
I know your secret.
Who wiped out dozens of your soldiers.
This ship isn't going anywhere, and I'm taking that armor back.
I'll stop you, first.
Single-handed? Guess it would have to be.
Keep clinging to that dream, Valon. It'll make your last moments easier.
There's no future for you.
Aww. You're trying so hard, aren't you, Jedi?
The White Maw is mine, along with this ship.
When she takes to the sky, the Outer Rim's gonna tremble before--what the--?
Tells us ship's engines are destroyed and pirates are gone.
That, Captain, is our signal that Lieutenant Iresso has disabled the flagship's engines and killed your men. But please, keep boasting.
All your men just died defending the engines. This ship's going nowhere.
That tells me Lieutenant Iresso has defeated your men and disabled the ship's engines.
Nice, Valon.
No. No! You can't do this! I'm untouchable! Even death can't take me!
This blind faith in your armor has poisoned your mind. It's not too late to save yourself.
Let go of this delusion.
You're the one who needs saving!
The coalition will be here soon. Your only hope of survival is to give up now.
You have to surrender.
They want me, they'll have to step over your carcass!
Enough talk. [Attack.]
You're finished, Jedi!
A Jedi. Perfect. You must be looking for me.
Captain Valon. Soon to command every pirate on Hoth. But you don't have to kneel or anything.
Please lay down your weapons, and tell your men to do the same.
I'd like you to surrender.
Well, since you ask so nicely--no.
The thermal bore device can't remain in your hands. Give it to me.
Return what you stole.
Not when this is about to get good.
You have quite the ego.
From a Jedi, that's like an expert opinion.
I was flattered--a whole coalition army sent just to kill me. But it got old... so I'm glad for something new.
Hmm. Nice day, pretty lady... maybe I'll let you go. For now. Better hurry before the device goes off.
You know, I'm in a good mood today. Get going before I set the device off--maybe you'll get far enough.
The device could kill hundreds of people if it cracks the ice shelf.
You're threatening innocents.
That's kind of the idea. Can't say I didn't give you a chance.
You don't need to do this.
Nobody got famous by rolling over without a fight.
I'd rather stay and kill you.
Cute. I don't do threats.
I'm unique. The galaxy hasn't seen a man like me since Nok Drayen wiped out half the Hutt Cartel in one night.
My legend's just begun--how about being the first Jedi I ever kill?
I said, get lost.
Get lost. You don't need this trouble.
How can you...? No, you can't keep this up for long!
Getting tired, Jedi? I could do this all day!
See? Nothing can kill me! But you ain't so lucky!
